jobTitle: Sr Data Scientist, Data Scientist Assoc, Sr Application Developer,
jobDescription: Capitalogix LLC has multiple openings to work in our office in Coppell, Texas. Sr Data Scientist to translate business needs into data reqs to prototype, develop & launch knowledge-based systems, data mining, machine learning, & natural language processing products & techs. Create process to calculate real time expectancy scores. Work with & perform data mining, machine learning, data analysis, data cleansing verification. Data Scientist Assoc to apply data mining techniques. Conduct statistical analysis using Advanced Excel. Build complex data sets using SQL, Netezza, & R. Develop machine learning codes in R utilizing Netezza’s parallel computing framework. Implement Machine Learning models to develop algorithmic trading systems. Sr Application Developer to perform full market trading system level development life cycle mgmt activities that perform to NFA communication & security standards. Perform component and data software & architecture design & testing for application development initiatives. Translate logical designs to create trading-based business logic designs. Create technical docs. Use massive parallel processing data warehouses & work in Visual Studio, ASP.net, IIS and DBMS.recblid o1tj3sfcdhpvv8562dawd2evb57kfb
